languages.text: "Благодарю за честь. Но вынужден отказаться. Я старый военный и верю в важность порядка во всем, в том числе — в субординации. Вы — Лорд-капитан, мой непосредственный командующий. Я не готов обращаться к вам никак иначе, кроме как с соблюдением полагающегося устава".

"I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за честь. Но вынужден отказаться. Я старый военный и верю в важность порядка во всем, в том числе — в субординации. Вы — Лорд-капитан, мой непосредственный командующий. Я не готов обращаться к вам никак иначе, кроме как с соблюдением полагающегося устава".

traits.locale_text: "I thank you for the honor. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, the commander in chief and my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thank you for the honor. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thank you for the honor. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, the commander in chief and my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢您赐予我这样的荣誉，但我必须拒绝。我曾是一名军官，我相信秩序对一切事物都必不可少，指挥系统也不例外。您是领主舰长，也是我的直属上级。根据规定，我不能以其他方式称呼您。”
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您赐予我这样的荣誉，但我必须拒绝。我曾是一名军官，我相信秩序对一切事物都必不可少，指挥系统也不例外。您是领主舰长，也是我的直属上级。根据规定，我不能以其他方式称呼您。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

languages.text: «Le agradezco el honor, pero debo negarme. Al haber sido oficial militar, creo en la importancia de tener todo en orden, incluyendo la cadena de mando. Al ser Lord Capitán y mi superior direct{mf|o|a}, no estoy dispuesto a dirigirme a usted de formas ajenas a la reglamentaria».
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: «Le agradezco el honor, pero debo negarme. Al haber sido oficial militar, creo en la importancia de tener todo en orden, incluyendo la cadena de mando. Al ser Lord Capitán y mi superior direct{mf|o|a}, no estoy dispuesto a dirigirme a usted de formas ajenas a la reglamentaria».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「光栄です。しかし、お断りしなければなりません。元軍人として、私は指揮系統を含め、あらゆる物事において秩序の重要性を信じています。あなたはロード・キャプテンであり、私の直属の上司です。規則以外の形によって、あなたを呼んではならぬのです」
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: 「光栄です。しかし、お断りしなければなりません。元軍人として、私は指揮系統を含め、あらゆる物事において秩序の重要性を信じています。あなたはロード・キャプテンであり、私の直属の上司です。規則以外の形によって、あなたを呼んではならぬのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch für die Ehre. Doch ich muss ablehnen. Als ehemaliger Militäroffizier bin ich überzeugt, dass alles seine Ordnung haben muss, auch die Befehlskette. Ihr seid der Lord Captain, ich unterstehe Euch. Ich bin nicht bereit, Euch auf andere als die vorgeschriebene Weise anzusprechen."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch für die Ehre. Doch ich muss ablehnen. Als ehemaliger Militäroffizier bin ich überzeugt, dass alles seine Ordnung haben muss, auch die Befehlskette. Ihr seid der Lord Captain, ich unterstehe Euch. Ich bin nicht bereit, Euch auf andere als die vorgeschriebene Weise anzusprechen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous remercie de m'accorder cet honneur, mais il me faut le refuser. Ayant été officier militaire, j'estime qu'il est important de respecter l'ordre établi, notamment dans la chaîne de commandement. Vous être {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|mon supérieur direct|ma supérieure directe}. Je ne suis pas prêt à dévier du règlement en vous appelant autrement que par votre titre. »
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie de m'accorder cet honneur, mais il me faut le refuser. Ayant été officier militaire, j'estime qu'il est important de respecter l'ordre établi, notamment dans la chaîne de commandement. Vous être {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|mon supérieur direct|ma supérieure directe}. Je ne suis pas prêt à dévier du règlement en vous appelant autrement que par votre titre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Teveccühünüz. Fakat kabul edemem. Eski bir asker olarak emir komuta zinciri de dâhil hayatın her alanında düzen olması gerektiğine inanırım. Siz Lord Kaptan olarak benim üstümsünüz. Size nizama yaraşmayan bir şekilde hitap etmem uygunsuz kaçar."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the honour. But I must decline. As a former military officer, I believe in the importance of order in all things, including the chain of command. You are the Lord Captain, my direct superior. I am not prepared to address you in any way other than as regulation dictates."

traits.locale_text: "Teveccühünüz. Fakat kabul edemem. Eski bir asker olarak hayatın her kısmında düzen olması gerektiğine inanırım, emir komuta zinciri de dâhil. Siz Lord Kaptan olarak benim üstümsünüz. Size düzenin dışında bir şekilde hitap etmem uygun olmaz."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
